compound.name: GetValues.ino
compound.brief: This prints basic meta-data about a sensor to the first serial port and then begins taking measurements from the sensor.
compound.description:
This prints basic meta-data about a sensor to the first serial port and then begins taking measurements from the sensor.

Author

Sara Geleskie Damiano sdamiano@stroudcenter.org

License

This example is published under the BSD-3 license.

1/** =========================================================================
2 * @example{lineno} GetValues.ino
3 * @author Sara Geleskie Damiano <sdamiano@stroudcenter.org>
4 * @license This example is published under the BSD-3 license.
5 *
6 * @brief This prints basic meta-data about a sensor to the first serial port
7 * and then begins taking measurements from the sensor.
8 *
9 * @m_examplenavigation{example_get_values,}
10 * @m_footernavigation
11 * ======================================================================= */
12
13// ==========================================================================
14// Include the libraries required for any data logger
15// ==========================================================================
16#include <Arduino.h>
17#include <ANBSensorsModbus.h>
18
19// ==========================================================================
20// Sensor Settings
21// ==========================================================================
22
23// Define the sensor's modbus address, or SlaveID
24byte modbusAddress = 0x55; // HEX 0x55 is the ANB default modbus address.
25
26// The Modbus baud rate the sensor uses
27int32_t modbusBaud = 57600; // 57600 is ANB default baud rate.
28
29// Sensor Timing
30// Edit these to explore
31#define WARM_UP_TIME \
32 30000L // milliseconds to wait for sensor to respond to commands.
33
34#define STABILIZATION_TIME 100 // milliseconds for readings to stabilize.
35
36#define MEASUREMENT_TIME 300000 // milliseconds to complete a measurement.
37
38#define TEST_POWER false
39
40// ==========================================================================
41// Data Logger Options
42// ==========================================================================
43const int32_t serialBaud = 115200; // Baud rate for serial monitor
44
45// Define pin number variables
46const int sensorPwrPin = 22; // The pin sending power to the sensor
47const int adapterPwrPin = 22; // The pin sending power to the RS485 adapter
48const int DEREPin =
49 -1; // The pin controlling Receive Enable and Driver Enable
50 // on the RS485 adapter, if applicable (else, -1)
51 // Setting HIGH enables the driver (arduino) to send text
52 // Setting LOW enables the receiver (sensor) to send text
53
54// Turn on debugging outputs (i.e. raw Modbus requests & responses)
55// by uncommenting next line (i.e. `#define DEBUG`)
56#define DEBUG
57
58// ==========================================================================
59// Create and Assign a Serial Port for Modbus
60// ==========================================================================
61// Hardware serial ports are preferred when available.
62// AltSoftSerial is the most stable alternative for modbus.
63// Select over alternatives with the define below.
64// #define BUILD_ALTSOFTSERIAL // Comment-out if you prefer alternatives
65
66#if defined(BUILD_ALTSOFTSERIAL) && defined(__AVR__)
67#include <AltSoftSerial.h>
68AltSoftSerial modbusSerial;
69
70#elif defined(ARDUINO_AVR_UNO) || defined(ARDUINO_AVR_FEATHER328P)
71// The Uno only has 1 hardware serial port, which is dedicated to communication
72// with the computer. If using an Uno, you will be restricted to using
73// AltSofSerial or SoftwareSerial
74#include <SoftwareSerial.h>
75const int SSRxPin =
76 10; // Receive pin for software serial (Rx on RS485 adapter)
77const int SSTxPin = 11; // Send pin for software serial (Tx on RS485 adapter)
78#pragma message("Using Software Serial for the Uno on pins 10 and 11")
79SoftwareSerial modbusSerial(SSRxPin, SSTxPin);
80
81#elif defined(ESP8266)
82#include <SoftwareSerial.h>
83#pragma message("Using Software Serial for the ESP8266")
84SoftwareSerial modbusSerial;
85
86#elif defined(NRF52832_FEATHER) || defined(ARDUINO_NRF52840_FEATHER)
87#pragma message("Using TinyUSB for the NRF52")
88#include <Adafruit_TinyUSB.h>
89HardwareSerial& modbusSerial = Serial1;
90
91#elif !defined(NO_GLOBAL_SERIAL1) && !defined(STM32_CORE_VERSION)
92// This is just a assigning another name to the same port, for convenience
93// Unless it is unavailable, always prefer hardware serial.
94#pragma message("Using HardwareSerial / Serial1")
95HardwareSerial& modbusSerial = Serial1;
96
97#else
98// This is just a assigning another name to the same port, for convenience
99// Unless it is unavailable, always prefer hardware serial.
100#pragma message("Using HardwareSerial / Serial")
101HardwareSerial& modbusSerial = Serial;
102#endif
103
104// Construct the anbSensor instance
105anbSensor sensor;
106bool success;
107
108// ==========================================================================
109// Working Functions
110// ==========================================================================
111// A function for pretty-printing the Modbuss Address in Hexadecimal notation,
112// from ANBSensorsModbus `sensorLocation()`
113String prettyprintAddressHex(byte _modbusAddress) {
114 String addressHex = F("0x");
115 if (_modbusAddress < 0x10) { addressHex += "0"; }
116 addressHex += String(_modbusAddress, HEX);
117 return addressHex;
118}
119
120void setSensorPower(bool power) {
121 if (sensorPwrPin >= 0) { digitalWrite(sensorPwrPin, power ? HIGH : LOW); }
122 if (adapterPwrPin >= 0 && adapterPwrPin != sensorPwrPin) {
123 digitalWrite(adapterPwrPin, power ? HIGH : LOW);
124 }
125}
126
127// ==========================================================================
128// Arduino Setup Function
129// ==========================================================================
130void setup() {
131// Wait for USB connection to be established by PC
132// NOTE: Only use this when debugging - if not connected to a PC, this
133// could prevent the script from starting
134#if defined(SERIAL_PORT_USBVIRTUAL)
135 while (!SERIAL_PORT_USBVIRTUAL && (millis() < 10000)) {
136 // wait
137 }
138#endif
139
140 // Turn on the "main" serial port for debugging via USB Serial Monitor
141 Serial.begin(serialBaud);
142
143 // Set pin modes
144 if (sensorPwrPin >= 0) { pinMode(sensorPwrPin, OUTPUT); }
145 if (adapterPwrPin >= 0 && adapterPwrPin != sensorPwrPin) {
146 pinMode(adapterPwrPin, OUTPUT);
147 }
148 if (DEREPin >= 0) { pinMode(DEREPin, OUTPUT); }
149#if defined(LED_BUILTIN)
150 if (LED_BUILTIN >= 0) { pinMode(LED_BUILTIN, OUTPUT); }
151#endif
152
153 // Turn on your modbus serial port
154#if defined(ESP8266)
155 const int SSRxPin =
156 13; // Receive pin for software serial (Rx on RS485 adapter)
157 const int SSTxPin =
158 14; // Send pin for software serial (Tx on RS485 adapter)
159 modbusSerial.begin(modbusBaud, SWSERIAL_8N1, SSRxPin, SSTxPin, false);
160#else // For Hardware Serial
161 modbusSerial.begin(modbusBaud);
162#endif
163
164 // Start up the connection to the ANB pH sensor
165 sensor.begin(modbusAddress, &modbusSerial, DEREPin);
166
167// Turn on debugging
168#ifdef DEBUG
169 sensor.setDebugStream(&Serial);
170#endif
171
172 // Start up note
173 Serial.print(F("\nTesting ANB pH Sensor"));
174 Serial.println();
175
176 // Confirm Modbus Address
177 Serial.println(F("Selected modbus address:"));
178 Serial.print(F(" Decimal: "));
179 Serial.print(modbusAddress, DEC);
180 Serial.print(F(", Hexidecimal: "));
181 Serial.println(prettyprintAddressHex(modbusAddress));
182 Serial.println();
183
184 Serial.println(F("Holding with power off for 15s"));
185 setSensorPower(false);
186 for (size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
187 delay(1000L);
188 Serial.print(F("."));
189 }
190 Serial.println();
191
192 // Turn on power pins
193 Serial.println(F("Powering on"));
194 setSensorPower(true);
195
196 // Allow the sensor and converter to warm up
197 Serial.print(F("Waiting up to "));
198 Serial.print(WARM_UP_TIME);
199 Serial.print(F(" ms for the sensor to be ready... "));
200 bool isReady = false;
201 uint32_t startTime = millis();
202 do {
203 delay(250);
204 isReady = sensor.isSensorReady();
205 } while (!isReady && millis() - startTime <= WARM_UP_TIME);
206 if (isReady) {
207 Serial.print(F("Sensor ready after "));
208 Serial.print(millis() - startTime);
209 Serial.println(F(" ms"));
210 } else {
211 Serial.print(F("Timed out waiting for ready after "));
212 Serial.print(millis() - startTime);
213 Serial.println(F(" ms"));
214 }
215
216 // // Enable modbus
217 // Serial.println(F("Enabling Modbus... "));
218 // bool isEnabled = sensor.enableModbus();
219 // Serial.print(F(" ..."));
220 // Serial.println(isEnabled ? F("success") : F("failed"));
221
222 // Try to force modbus if the enable failed
223 if (!isReady) {
224 Serial.println(F("Trying to get any modbus response... "));
225 bool gotModbusResponse = sensor.gotModbusResponse();
226 if (!gotModbusResponse) {
227 Serial.println(F("Did not get a modbus response, trying to force "
228 "Modbus enable... "));
229 sensor.forceModbus();
230 Serial.println(F("Trying again get a modbus response... "));
231 gotModbusResponse = sensor.gotModbusResponse();
232 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
233 Serial.println(gotModbusResponse ? F("success") : F("failed"));
234 }
235 }
236
237 // Get Sensor Information
238 Serial.print(F("\n\n\nGet sensor information...\n"));
239
240 // Get the sensor serial number
241 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor serial number."));
242 String SN = sensor.getSerialNumber();
243 Serial.print(F(" Serial Number: "));
244 Serial.println(SN);
245
246 // Get the sensor manufacturer
247 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor manufacturer."));
248 String manufacturer = sensor.getManufacturer();
249 Serial.print(F(" Manufacturer: "));
250 Serial.println(manufacturer);
251
252 // Get the sensor name
253 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor name."));
254 String name = sensor.getName();
255 Serial.print(F(" Name: "));
256 Serial.println(name);
257
258 // Get the sensor sub-name
259 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor sub-name."));
260 String subname = sensor.getSubName();
261 Serial.print(F(" Subname: "));
262 Serial.println(subname);
263
264 // Get the sensor interface version
265 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor interface version."));
266 String interfaceVersion = sensor.getInterfaceVersion();
267 Serial.print(F(" Interface Version: "));
268 Serial.println(interfaceVersion);
269
270 // Get the sensor driver version
271 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor driver version."));
272 String driverVersion = sensor.getDriverVersion();
273 Serial.print(F(" Driver Version: "));
274 Serial.println(driverVersion);
275
276 // Get the sensor RTC
277 Serial.println(F("Getting sensor RTC."));
278 uint16_t seconds = -1;
279 uint16_t minutes = -1;
280 uint16_t hours = -1;
281 uint16_t day = -1;
282 uint16_t month = -1;
283 uint16_t year = -1;
284 sensor.getRTC(seconds, minutes, hours, day, month, year);
285 Serial.print(F(" RTC: "));
286 Serial.print(month);
287 Serial.print(F("/"));
288 Serial.print(day);
289 Serial.print(F("/"));
290 Serial.print(year);
291 Serial.print(F(" "));
292 Serial.print(hours);
293 Serial.print(F(":"));
294 Serial.print(minutes);
295 Serial.print(F(":"));
296 Serial.print(seconds);
297 Serial.println();
298
299 // Get Readable Sensor Configuration
300 Serial.print(F("\n\nGet sensor configuration...\n"));
301
302#if 0
303 // Get Sensor Modbus Baud
304 Serial.println(F("Get sensor modbus baud setting."));
305 ANBSensorBaud sensorBaud = sensor.getBaud();
306 Serial.print(F(" Baud: "));
307 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(sensorBaud));
308 Serial.println();
309
310 // Get Sensor Control Mode
311 Serial.println(F("Get sensor control mode."));
312 ANBSensorMode controlMode = sensor.getControlMode();
313 Serial.print(F(" Control Mode: "));
314 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(controlMode));
315 Serial.println();
316
317 // Get Sensor Salinity Mode
318 Serial.println(F("Get sensor salinity mode."));
319 ANBSalinityMode salinityMode = sensor.getSalinityMode();
320 Serial.print(F(" Salinity Mode: "));
321 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(salinityMode));
322 Serial.println();
323
324 // Get Sensor Power Style
325 Serial.println(F("Get sensor power style."));
326 ANBPowerStyle powerStyle = sensor.getPowerStyle();
327 Serial.print(F(" Power Style: "));
328 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(powerStyle));
329 Serial.println();
330#endif
331
332 // Get Sensor Sampling Interval
333 Serial.println(F("Get sensor sampling interval."));
334 uint8_t samplingInterval = sensor.getIntervalTime();
335 Serial.print(F(" Sampling Interval: "));
336 Serial.println(samplingInterval);
337 Serial.println();
338
339 // Get current immersion rule settings
340 Serial.println(F("Get current immersion rule settings."));
341 bool immersionRule = sensor.isImmersionSensorEnabled();
342 Serial.print(F(" Immersion sensor is "));
343 Serial.println(immersionRule ? "enabled" : "disabled");
344
345 // Configure sensor
346 Serial.print(F("\n\nConfigure sensor...\n"));
347
348 // Set Sensor Control Mode
349 Serial.print(F("Set sensor control mode to controlled... "));
350 bool modeSet = sensor.setControlMode(ANBSensorMode::CONTROLLED);
351 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
352 Serial.println(modeSet ? F("success") : F("failed"));
353
354 // Set Sensor Salinity Mode
355 Serial.print(F("Set sensor salinity mode to low salinity... "));
356 bool salinitySet = sensor.setSalinityMode(ANBSalinityMode::LOW_SALINITY);
357 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
358 Serial.println(salinitySet ? F("success") : F("failed"));
359
360// Set Sensor Power Style
361#if TEST_POWER
362 Serial.print(F("Set sensor power style to on measurement... "));
363 bool powerStyleSet = sensor.setPowerStyle(ANBPowerStyle::ON_MEASUREMENT);
364#else
365 Serial.print(F("Set sensor power style to always powered... "));
366 bool powerStyleSet = sensor.setPowerStyle(ANBPowerStyle::ALWAYS_POWERED);
367#endif
368 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
369 Serial.println(powerStyleSet ? F("success") : F("failed"));
370
371 // Set Sampling Interval Time
372 Serial.print(F("Set sensor sampling interval to 0 (continuous)... "));
373 bool intervalSet = sensor.setIntervalTime(0);
374 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
375 Serial.println(intervalSet ? F("success") : F("failed"));
376
377 // Set Immersion Rule
378 Serial.print(F("Set sensor immersion rule to enabled... "));
379 bool immersionSet = sensor.enableImmersionSensor();
380 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
381 Serial.println(immersionSet ? F("success") : F("failed"));
382
383#if 0
384 // Reboot the sensor after configuration to save and apply settings
385 Serial.print(F("\n\nRebooting sensor... "));
386 bool rebooted = sensor.reboot();
387 Serial.println(rebooted ? F("success") : F("failed"));
388
389 Serial.println(F("\n\nForcing modbus after reboot... "));
390 sensor.forceModbus();
391#endif
392
393#if TEST_POWER
394 Serial.println(F("\n\n\nHolding with power off for 15 seconds..."));
395 setSensorPower(false);
396 for (size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
397 delay(1000L);
398 Serial.print(F("."));
399 }
400 Serial.println();
401#endif
402}
403
404// ==========================================================================
405// Arduino Loop Function
406// ==========================================================================
407void loop() {
408#if TEST_POWER
409 // Turn on power pins
410 Serial.println(F("Powering on"));
411 setSensorPower(true);
412#endif
413
414 // Allow the sensor and converter to warm up
415 Serial.print(F("Waiting up to "));
416 Serial.print(WARM_UP_TIME);
417 Serial.print(F(" ms for the sensor to be ready... "));
418 bool isReady = false;
419 uint32_t startTime = millis();
420 do {
421 delay(250);
422 isReady = sensor.isSensorReady();
423 } while (!isReady && millis() - startTime <= WARM_UP_TIME);
424 if (isReady) {
425 Serial.print(F("Sensor ready after "));
426 Serial.print(millis() - startTime);
427 Serial.println(F(" ms"));
428 } else {
429 Serial.print(F("Timed out waiting for ready after "));
430 Serial.print(millis() - startTime);
431 Serial.println(F(" ms"));
432 }
433
434 Serial.println(F("\n\nStarting a scan... "));
435 bool scanStarted = sensor.start();
436 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
437 Serial.println(scanStarted ? F("success") : F("failed"));
438 if (!scanStarted) {
439 // Wait before the next attempt
440 Serial.println(F("Waiting before the next attempt..."));
441 for (size_t i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
442 delay(1000L);
443 Serial.print(F("."));
444 }
445 Serial.println('\n');
446 return;
447 } else {
448#if defined(LED_BUILTIN)
449 digitalWrite(LED_BUILTIN, HIGH);
450#endif
451 }
452
453 startTime = millis();
454 Serial.println(F("\n\nWaiting for measurement to be ready... "));
455 delay(6000L);
456 while (!sensor.isMeasurementComplete() &&
457 millis() - startTime <= MEASUREMENT_TIME) {
458 if (millis() - startTime > MEASUREMENT_TIME) {
459 Serial.print(F("Measurement timed out after "));
460 Serial.print(MEASUREMENT_TIME / 60000);
461 Serial.println(F(" minutes."));
462 return;
463 }
464 for (size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
465 delay(1000L);
466 Serial.print(F("."));
467 }
468 }
469 Serial.print(F("Measurement took "));
470 Serial.print(millis() - startTime);
471 Serial.println(F(" milliseconds."));
472
473 Serial.println(F("\n\nGetting results in bulk..."));
474 float pH2, temperature2, salinity2, spcond2, raw_cond2;
475 ANBHealthCode health2;
476 ANBStatusCode status2;
477 ANBDiagnosticCode diagStatus2;
478 sensor.getValues(pH2, temperature2, salinity2, spcond2, raw_cond2, health2,
479 status2, diagStatus2);
480 Serial.print(F(" pH: "));
481 Serial.println(pH2);
482 Serial.print(F(" Temperature: "));
483 Serial.println(temperature2);
484 Serial.print(F(" Salinity: "));
485 Serial.println(salinity2);
486 Serial.print(F(" Specific Conductance: "));
487 Serial.println(spcond2);
488 Serial.print(F(" Raw Conductivity: "));
489 Serial.println(raw_cond2);
490 Serial.print(F(" Health: "));
491 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(health2));
492 Serial.print(F(" Status: "));
493 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(status2));
494 Serial.print(F(" Diagnostic Status: "));
495 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(diagStatus2));
496
497 Serial.println(F("\n\nGetting results individually..."));
498 float pH = sensor.getpH();
499 float temperature = sensor.getTemperature();
500 float salinity = sensor.getSalinity();
501 float spcond = sensor.getSpecificConductance();
502 float raw_cond = sensor.getRawConductivity();
503 ANBHealthCode health = sensor.getHealthCode();
504 ANBStatusCode status = sensor.getStatusCode();
505 ANBDiagnosticCode diagStatus = sensor.getDiagnosticCode();
506 Serial.print(F(" pH: "));
507 Serial.println(pH);
508 Serial.print(F(" Temperature: "));
509 Serial.println(temperature);
510 Serial.print(F(" Salinity: "));
511 Serial.println(salinity);
512 Serial.print(F(" Specific Conductance: "));
513 Serial.println(spcond);
514 Serial.print(F(" Raw Conductivity: "));
515 Serial.println(raw_cond);
516 Serial.print(F(" Health: "));
517 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(health));
518 Serial.print(F(" Status: "));
519 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(status));
520 Serial.print(F(" Diagnostic Status: "));
521 Serial.println(static_cast<uint16_t>(diagStatus));
522
523
524 Serial.println(F("\n\nStopping scan... "));
525 bool scanStopped = sensor.stop();
526 Serial.print(F(" ..."));
527 Serial.println(scanStopped ? F("success") : F("failed"));
528 if (scanStopped) {
529#if defined(LED_BUILTIN)
530 digitalWrite(LED_BUILTIN, LOW);
531#endif
532 }
533
534// Wait for the next reading
535#if TEST_POWER
536 Serial.println(F("\n\nHolding with power off before the next reading..."));
537 setSensorPower(false);
538#else
539 Serial.println(F("\n\nWaiting with power on for the next reading..."));
540#endif
541 for (size_t i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
542 delay(1000L);
543 Serial.print(F("."));
544 }
545 Serial.println(F("\n\n"));
546}
547
548// cspell: ignore DEREPin SWSERIAL spcond
breadcrumb: Examples using the ANB Sensors Modbus Library
